description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the Remote Code Execution vulnerability in the Windows USB Generic Parent Driver (CVE-2024-21339), ensure you apply the appropriate KB updates for your Windows version:

1. **For Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2**:
   - Download and apply KB5034765 from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.

2. **For Windows 11 Version 21H2**:
   - Download and apply KB5034766.

3. **For Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2**:
   - Download and apply KB5034763.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a critical vulnerability that allows Remote Code Execution if an attacker manipulates the vulnerable component.
- Ensure your system meets the required build numbers as listed:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3155
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.4046
- For manual installations, visit the links below:
  - [KB5034766 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
  - [KB5034765 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - [KB5034763 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is on one of the listed Windows builds.
- Backup important data before applying these updates.
